name: Tower of Metababel
description:
In a distant planet, a massive tower is said to stretch beyond the skies and into the cosmos. You enter the tower in hopes of conquering it, but you can't stop moving! That won't stop you from climbing the tower though!

The goal of the game is to climb a procedurally generated tower and score as high as possible before you die or time runs out. Pick up health and time powerups by destroying crates and enemies, and upgrade your max health or max jumps if you get enough points.

Made for the MetaBoy Game Jam.

Source code: https://github.com/svntax/MetaBoyJam-2022

Credits:

  • Title music, game music, and upgrade jingle by SketchyLogic https://opengameart.org/content/nes-shooter-music-5-tracks-3-jingles
  • Equipment Pro font by somepx https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free
  • Sound effects made with sfxia https://rxi.itch.io/sfxia
  • All other art besides the player was made by me.
